001package com.technototes.vision.subsystem;
002
003import org.openftc.easyopencv.OpenCvCameraRotation;
004
005import com.technototes.library.subsystem.Subsystem;
006import com.technototes.vision.hardware.Camera;
007
008@SuppressWarnings("unused")
009public class PipelineSubsystem implements Subsystem {
010
011    protected Camera camera;
012
013    public PipelineSubsystem(Camera c) {
014        camera = c;
015    }
016
017    public Camera getDevice() {
018        return camera;
019    }
020
021    public PipelineSubsystem startStreaming(int width, int height) {
022        camera.startStreaming(width, height);
023        return this;
024    }
025
026    public PipelineSubsystem startStreaming(int width, int height, OpenCvCameraRotation rotation) {
027        camera.startStreaming(width, height, rotation);
028        return this;
029    }
030
031    public PipelineSubsystem stopStreaming() {
032        camera.stopStreaming();
033        return this;
034    }
035}
